title: Hour 2: G.O.A.T?
description:
Is Serena Williams the G.O.A.T of women's tennis? Mad Dog doesn't think so. Plus, Mad Dog and Stephen react to Jeanie Buss calling Russell Westbrook the Lakers "best player last year." Booger McFarland reveals if he's more of less concerned with the Bucs this season. Later Stephen A. schools Mad Dog on the best rivalries in College Football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
